thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | www.flashbay.com
thread.title: Brian

author: Brian
title: Brian
text: My organization has used Flashbay's products for the third consecutive year, because their product is absolutely top-of-the-line and their customer service is second to none. Compared to most other companies out there, Flashbay offers a diverse variety of products to suit your particular need. Communication is always quick with Flashbay - I never have had to wait more than 24 hours for a response back to any of my questions or needs! Nick has been an outstanding representative, whom I have had the pleasure of working with. Ask for him - he'll make sure you get what you need fast!
